diagnoses: explanation:Pyuria (pus in urine) is a key symptom of UTI. UTIs can also cause anemia in some cases. Conjunctivitis and cervical lymphadenopathy may be coincidental or related to a systemic infection.}

and anemia. Pyuria may be present due to associated urethritis.}
and urinary abnormalities like pyuria due to lupus nephritis.}
